sentences.english: A diet rich in vegetables and whole grains reduces your cancer risk significantly.
sentences.chinese: 平常大量食用蔬菜和粗糧能顯著降低患癌症的風險。

sentences.english: Good sources of thiamine include unrefined cereal grains.
sentences.chinese: 硫胺素在穀物粗糧中含量豐富。

sentences.english: Eat whole grains and fresh fruits and vegetables as much as possible to keep your mind and body sharp.
sentences.chinese: 儘量多喫粗糧，新鮮水果和蔬菜以保持身心健康。

sentences.english: Dude, what were they feeding you, kibble?
sentences.chinese: 夥計，他們拿什麼餵你的，粗糧？

sentences.english: Rice and wheat flour are refined food while other beans & grains are coarse food in China.
sentences.chinese: 大米和小麥被稱爲細糧，其它糧食就成了粗糧或雜糧。

sentences.english: The main course of roughage will surely causes you longer time than the rice and flour.
sentences.chinese: 粗糧的主食喫起來也肯定比白米白麪慢。

sentences.english: Constipation can be prevented by maintenance of a high fluid intake and a diet high in bulk and roughage.
sentences.chinese: 便祕可以通過飲食纖維含量高的食物或粗糧得以預防。

sentences.english: Eat more beans, lentils, seeds, nuts and whole grains.
sentences.chinese: 多喫豆類，小扁豆，種子，堅果和粗糧。

sentences.english: But he was very poor when he was young, living on coarse6 foods year in year out.
sentences.chinese: 但子路小的時候家裏很窮，長年靠喫粗糧野菜度日。

sentences.english: It will be better if added a kind of roughage.
sentences.chinese: 如果加上一種粗糧就更好了。

sentences.english: Do you eat whole-grain, high-fiber foods regularly?
sentences.chinese: 你有沒有經常喫粗糧，高纖維的食物？

sentences.english: Eat more roughage to keep healthy.
Increase whole-grain intake by replacing refined grains with whole grains.
sentences.chinese: 增加粗糧的攝入以取代細糧。

definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat
to put on weight/to get fat
